channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Special Feed Items
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Special Feed Items

item.title: CVE-2024-8051|2024-09-17T06:00:05.472Z -- unknown -- special%20feed%20items
item.description: The Special Feed Items WordPress plugin through 1.0.1 does not have CSRF check in some places, and is missing sanitisation as well as escaping, which could allow attackers to make logged in admin add Stored XSS payloads via a CSRF attack.
